author: zinkk757
title: 5/5 GREAT SET
review: this set has so many capabilaties from a tank to a survelance craft.  I got it new in the box on ebay a few years back and have loved all of the things you can get out of it.  The rotating turret on the rear half of the vehicle is totally awesome.  I take the arms off of the front part when i use it as a tank because they swivel when you drive it forwards. Overall it doesn't really have any bad parts about it, besides the loose hinges.

author: Takeshi
title: Greetings, Earthlings...
review:
I loved this set soooooooooo much, when I got it, I didn't want any other lego set for like, three months! It has an awesome cannon, swivel arms, an interesting cockpit (for the front part of the vehicle), and colour change pads.

Awesome set, reccomended for space lovers.
